results.description: Reports from the weekend's Premiership and Pro14 games.
results.shortTitle: Reports from the weekend's rugby games
results.title: Premiership and Pro14 rugby: Reports from the weekend's games

thumbnail.altText: Charlie Mulchrone in action for Harlequins

results.description: Ross Byrne's first-half penalty is the only score as defending Pro14 champions Leinster have to graft to beat Zebre 3-0 in a wet Parma.
results.shortTitle: Leinster battle to 3-0 win over Zebre
results.title: Pro14: Leinster made to battle to secure 3-0 win over Zebre in a wet Parma

thumbnail.altText: Ross Byrne's 20th-minute penalty was enough to maintain Leinster's winning start to this year's Pro14
Ross Byrne's 20th-minute penalty was enough to maintain Leinster's winning start to this year's Pro14
Ross Byrne's 20th-minute penalty was enough to maintain Leinster's winning start to this year's Pro14

results.description: Scarlets touch down four times in each half to rout Zebre in Llanelli and stay unbeaten in the Pro14 this season.
results.title: Pro14: Scarlets 54-10 Zebre

thumbnail.altText: Kieran Hardy and Steff Evans celebrate

results.description: Live BBC Radio Wales and BBC Radio Cymru commentary as Scarlets host Zebre in the Pro14.
results.title: Listen: Pro14 - Scarlets v Zebre

thumbnail.altText: Kieran Hardy scores Scarlets' first try

results.description: Dragons won their first away game in the Pro14 since March 2015 as they secured a bonus-point win against 14-man Zebre at Stadio Sergio Lanfranchi.
results.title: Zebre 28-52 Dragons: Welsh region win their first Pro14 away game since 2015

results.description: Former Ulster second row Ian Nagle agrees to join Italian Pro14 side Zebre for next season.
results.shortTitle: Departing Ulster lock Nagle joins Zebre
results.title: Ian Nagle: Departing Ulster lock joins Zebre

thumbnail.altText: Ian Nagle in action for Ulster this season
Ian Nagle in action for Ulster this season
Ian Nagle in action for Ulster this season
Ian Nagle in action for Ulster this season

results.description: Connacht take another step towards the Pro14 play-offs place with a scrappy 6-5 win over Zebre in Parma.
results.shortTitle: Connacht edge Zebre in dour contest
results.title: Pro14: Connacht edge Zebre 6-5 to move closer to play-off place

results.description: Munster recover from 12 points down to claim a bonus-point 31-12 win over Zebre to keep pace with Glasgow in Conference A.
results.shortTitle: Munster battle to bonus win over Zebre
results.title: Pro14: Munster battle to bonus-point win over Zebre

results.description: Glasgow Warriors surge to the top of Pro14 Conference A with a thumping six-try win over Zebre.
results.shortTitle: Six-try Glasgow thump Zebre to go top
results.title: Zebre 10-42 Glasgow Warriors: Visitors score six tries and go top of Conference A

results.description: Once-capped Wales wing Luke Morgan crosses for a hat-trick as Ospreys cruise to a 43-0 win over Zebre in the Pro14.
results.title: Guinness Pro14: Ospreys 43-0 Zebre

thumbnail.altText: Luke Morgan scoring a try in the corner

results.description: Listen to BBC Radio Wales commentary as Ospreys host Zebre in the Pro14 on Friday.
results.title: Listen - Pro14: Ospreys v Zebre

results.description: Rory Scannell scores a last minute try as Munster claim a bonus-point win in an uninspiring encounter with Zebre in Parma.
results.shortTitle: Late Scannell try seals bonus-point win
results.title: Pro14: Munster score late try to secure bonus-point in 32-7 over Zebre

results.description: Live text commentary & radio coverage as Edinburgh play Zebre in their latest Pro14 fixture.
results.title: Pro14: Zebre v Edinburgh reaction - Scots squander 13-point lead to lose in Italy

results.description: A late penalty consigns Bristol to a narrow defeat at Italian side Zebre in their second European Challenge Cup pool game.
results.shortTitle: Bristol suffer narrow defeat at Zebre
results.title: European Rugby Challenge Cup: Bristol slip to late defeat at Zebre

thumbnail.altText: Bristol Bears lost to Zebre in round two of the European Challenge Cup.

results.description: Bristol Bears run in seven tries as they beat Zebre to get their European Challenge Cup campaign off to a winning start.
results.shortTitle: Bristol mark European return with win
results.title: European Rugby Challenge Cup: Bristol Bears beat Zebre at Ashton Gate

results.description: Coverage from the European Rugby Champions Cup and Challenge Cup - listen to BBC Radio 5 live, 5 live sports extra and BBC local radio commentary.
results.title: Listen to live Champions Cup & Challenge Cup European Rugby commentary

results.description: Dragons beat Zebre 16-5 in rain-drenched conditions in the Pro14 at Rodney Parade, with tries from Arwel Robson and Dafydd Howells.
results.title: Pro14: Dragons 16-5 Zebre

thumbnail.altText: Arwel Robson of Dragons runs in to score a try

results.description: Connacht register their first win under new head coach Andy Friend with a 32-13 demolition of Zebre in their Pro14 clash at the Sportsground.
results.title: Pro14: Five-try Connacht power to a 32-13 defeat of Zebre in Galway

results.description: Former Scarlets lock Tadhg Beirne is voted Pro14's player of the season for the 2017-18 campaign.
results.shortTitle: Beirne voted Pro14 player of the season
results.title: Ireland international Tadhg Beirne voted Pro14 player of the season

results.description: Zebre set their new wins record as they hammer much-changed Ospreys in Parma with a bonus-point Pro14 triumph.
results.title: Pro14: Zebre 37-14 Ospreys

thumbnail.altText: Ospreys' Adam Beard tries to halt the Zebre forwards
